title: Euler’s Method Calculator – Numerical Solution of y′ = f(x, y)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: y_{n+1} = y_n + h\, f(x_n, y_n), \quad n = 0,1,\dots,N-1.
formulas.raw: y_{n+1} = y_n + h\, f(x_n, y_n), \quad n = 0,1,\dots,N-1.

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Predictor: \[ \tilde{y}_{n+1} = y_n + h\, f(x_n, y_n), \] Corrector: \[ y_{n+1} = y_n + \frac{h}{2}\Big(f(x_n, y_n) + f(x_{n+1}, \tilde{y}_{n+1})\Big). \]

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)
